data.name: Obscurity: Unknown Threat
data.detailed_description:
Fight for your life in Obscurity: Unknown Threat. A sandbox shooter environment where immersive gunplay, gore mechanics and player skill dictate the outcome of a battle.

As an indie title, this game is under active development and has not yet reached release state. Join now to participate and help shape the growth of the game as we realise our vision.

Features include:

  • Progression along 9 class tracks
  • Horror PvP survival game modes against the Obscurity
  • Classic shooter PvP game modes
  • Dynamic time of day and weather system
  • Full loadout customisation
  • Synchronised ragdoll positions for falls and launches
  • In-depth health and healing system
  • Brutal melee combat
  • Fully featured gore system including broken bones, dismemberment and wound deformation

data.short_description: Obscurity: Unknown Threat is a horror shooter game where a team of soldiers must survive against a hidden foe. The game contains both conventional symmetrical FPS game modes as well as asymmetrical battles vs the Obscurity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.2 running the latest version of Metal
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
The game is a First Person Shooter and as such contains frequent violence and gore associated with the use of items such as guns, knives and blunt weaponry.

This can include visual wounds, bone breaks, blood spurts, limb removal and decapitations.
